Name: Cherry Mash Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The rich flavour of Tennessee whiskey soured with lemon and sweetened with cherry liqueur.
History: Created by Dale DeGroff when Beverage Manager at the Rainbow Room Promenade Bar, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Mash Sour contains 237 calories
